explanation: The stage direction describes a character's interaction with an object. The character pulls out a half-circle from his pocket and aims it at a cane he is holding, which serves as a support. This involves manipulating and handling objects, which fits the definition of the 'object' category.
stgdir: Il tire de sa poche un demi Cercle, et le braque sur une canne qu'il tient à la main, et qui sert d'appui.
